biotools.summary: Gifi Array Analyzer is a Java application for integrated analysis of DNA microarray data and gene functional classification data.Gifi Array Analyzer implements Homals (Homogeneity Analysis by means of Alternating Least Square). Homogeneity analysis is a graphical, multivariate statistical method.

bioschemas.name: Gifi Array Analyzer 1.2 beta
